segments.text: Good morning , young lady . You can call me Ma . Do you see anything you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Many things ! I especially love this beautiful quilt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That quilt was passed down to me from my ma in Holland .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds like a special quilt . Why do you want to sell it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , this home is too big for me now , so I'm moving to an apartment that is much smaller . Therefore , I need to part with a few things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Umm , how much do you want for the quilt ?
segments.speaker: S2
